<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting">
    <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <code_url/>
        <code_url_2/>
        <details/>
        <example_steps/>
        <example_url/>
        <module/>
        <number>SNSCRIPT0001093</number>
        <replaced_by/>
        <script>var feedback_user = current.user;

usr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');

usr.addQuery('sys_id', feedback_user);
usr.query();

while (usr.next()){

	usr.u_badge_points ++;
    usr.update();
}
</script>
        <script_2/>
        <script_type>Business Rule</script_type>
        <short_description>Awarding Badge Points to Users Based on Providing Feedback to KB Articles</short_description>
        <state>Submitted</state>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-08-28 18:53:00</sys_created_on>

        <tested_on_helsinki/>
    </x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting>
</record_update>
